fields.name: Generated password
fields.message_text_template:
Dear [[contact]],

You have requested a password change! Your newly generated password is:

[[password]]

We recommend you to change this password on your next login.

Kind regards, R3sourcer team

fields.name: Job Offer Placement Confirmation
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]] - SHIFT CONFIRMED! [[target_date_and_time]] Start!
[[job__jobsite]].
[[timesheet__supervisor]], [[timesheet__supervisor__contact__phone_mobile]].
Make sure you arrive 10mins early have full PPE, white card, ID and relevant licences with you. Contact site foreman upon arrival.
Any issues call [[master_company]]

fields.name: Mobile Phone Verification
fields.message_text_template: Dear [[contact]], thank you for registering as Candidate with [[master_company]]. Please verify your phone by replying with YES. Best regards, [[manager]].

fields.name: Login SMS Token
fields.message_text_template: Mobile login for [[contact]]. Please follow this link: [[auth_url]]. If the link has expired please request a new one by replying with LOGIN or visiting [[project_url]]

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours (old shift)
fields.message_text_template: Hello [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked on [[shift_end_date]]. Once you have submitted your hours, your site foreman today will be asked to approve them. Please make sure you are accurate and honest or your hours will not get approved. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] -> Customer Access. Thank you.

fields.name: Job Offer 1st
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]]. JOB OFFER!
[[job__position]] in [[jobsite_address__city__name]]/[[jobsite_address__state__name]].
Shift starts at [[target_date_and_time]].
Reply YES to confirm or NO to decline.
[[master_company]]

fields.name: Candidate JO Cancelled <1 hrs
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]],
The [[job__position]] shift starting at [[target_date_and_time]] for [[job__jobsite]] job booking has been CANCELLED. Regards, [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact]], [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact__phone_mobile]]

fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign Reminder
fields.message_text_template:
Hi [[supervisor]], you still have outstanding timesheets to approve, please action immediately by clicking the link [[get_url]] or login via your computer to  [[site_url]].
Please note failure to do so will affect worker wages and your rates for the next order.
Any issues please contact [[portfolio_manager]] [[portfolio_manager__contact__phone_mobile]].
Thank you

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Agree
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]],
Unfortunately your time sheet for [[shift_start_date]] was REJECTED by [[supervisor]]. Mobile: [[supervisor__contact__phone_mobile]]
Start time: [[shift_start_time]]
Finish time: [[shift_end_time]]
Break: [[shift_break_hours]]
Total: [[shift_worked_hours]]
If you do not agree to time sheet correction, please contact site manager in [[supervisor_timeout]] hours to correct the timesheet.
Regards, [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact]]

fields.name: Job Offer Recurring
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]].
Are you able to work at the same site? [[job__position]].
[[job__jobsite__get_address]]
Shift starts at [[target_date_and_time]]. 
Reply YES to confirm or NO to decline.
[[master_company]]

fields.name: Contact Mobile Phone Verification
fields.message_text_template: Dear [[contact]], thank you for registering with [[master_company]]. Please verify your phone by replying with YES. Best regards, [[manager]].

fields.name: Job Confirmed
fields.message_text_template:
[[supervisor__contact]]
JOB CONFIRMED for [[get_confirmation_string]] at [[jobsite]] jobsite. Order link: [[auth_url]].
Any issues please call [[portfolio_manager]], [[portfolio_manager__contact__phone_mobile]] thanks!

fields.name: Candidate TimeSheet Hours
fields.message_text_template: [[candidate_contact]] please click on the link [[get_fill_time_sheet_url]] to submit your timesheet for hours worked today. If you are unable to open the link, please submit your hours on a computer: [[site_url]] . Thank you.

fields.name: Candidate JO Cancelled
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]],
The [[job__position]] shift starting at [[target_date_and_time]] for [[job__jobsite]] job has been CANCELLED. We may send you another offer. Regards, [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact]], [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact__phone_mobile]]

fields.name: Job Offer Rejection
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]],
Unfortunately, the shift for [[job__jobsite]] at [[target_date_and_time]] has been filled!
Be ready for more offers... [[master_company]]

fields.name: Candidate Going To Work
fields.message_text_template:
[[candidate_contact]].
Are you on your way to work? Confirm now by replying YES.
Failure to reply in 30 minutes will result in your shift being cancelled!
Make sure you have your white card and full PPE and you are on time.
Thanks, [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact]], [[candidate_contact__recruitment_agent__contact__phone_mobile]]

fields.name: Supervisor TimeSheet Sign
fields.message_text_template:
Hi [[supervisor]] please approve or amend hours for your worker(s) by clinking the link [[get_url]] Please do so urgently so that workers can get paid for hours worked. If you cannot access the link simply reply LOGIN to this SMS and a new link will be sent to you.
You can also approve hours online: [[site_url]]. Thank you!
